thread.title: Johnny Marr: I only get nerves in Manchester
thread.title_full: Johnny Marr: I only get nerves in Manchester | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Johnny Marr: I only get nerves in Manchester
text:
Johnny Marr - The full interview
Play video Manchester music legend Johnny Marr is preparing for the second of two sell-out nights in his hometown, and says they are the only gigs that make him nervous.
The guitarist, singer and songwriter was behind some of the most recognisable hits of the Manchester scene with The Smiths.
He's played guitar with The The, Modest Mouse, The Cribs and Noel Gallagher and influenced a host of bands.
He spoke to Mike Hall.
Johnny Marr says Manchester gigs are special Credit: Mike Hall Johnny plays the second of two sell-out shows in Manchester tonight (Thursday), at the Albert Hall.
And Johnny was full of praise for his home fans:
Play video Johnny also has a live album in the pipeline, which is out on Friday .
Johnny on stage at the Albert Hall Credit: Granada Reports Last updated Thu 8 Oct 2015 Entertainment Music Manchester
